title: Checkpointing
description:
Save and restore run state for resume capability.

internal/checkpoint/checkpoint.go:
- Checkpoint struct (ID, EpicID, Iteration, Tokens, Cost, CompletedTasks, GitCommit, Scratchpad)
- Manager struct with directory (.ticker/checkpoints/)
- Save(state) - write JSON checkpoint file
- Load(id) (*Checkpoint, error) - read checkpoint
- List() ([]Checkpoint, error) - list available checkpoints

Checkpoint at configurable intervals (default: every 5 iterations).
Include current git commit SHA for potential rollback.
